name: Chapter 3: Aurelia Academy
short_description: Sarah meets a group of friendly locals who take her to Aurelia Academy, a prestigious magical school. She decides to enroll to learn the basics of magic as a means of survival.
events: Meeting locals, enrolling in magical school
people: Sarah Davis, friendly locals, Aurelia Academy staff
from_prev_chapter: Sarah meets locals who explain the basics of the world.
to_next_chapter: Sarah begins her studies at Aurelia Academy.

beats.long_title: Get Acquainted with the Enchanting Environs of the Magical Forest
beats.description: After being guided by the locals, Sarah finds herself at the edge of a mystical, enchanting forest. She sees flora and fauna that defy the laws of physics she knows, awakening her curiosity and wonder.

beats.long_title: Sarah Meets the Friendly Locals Who Will Guide Her Journey
beats.description: Sarah encounters a group of friendly locals who are eager to help. They are curious about her and share crucial information about the new world, hinting at the existence of Aurelia Academy.

beats.long_title: The Locals Share Legends and Facts about Aurelia Academy
beats.description: The locals describe Aurelia Academy as the pinnacle of magical education in the land. They detail its history, famous alumni, and the various forms of magic taught there.

beats.long_title: Sarah Ponders Her Choices and Future in This New World
beats.description: Sarah is torn between her yearning to return home and the opportunity to learn magic. She realizes that understanding magic might be crucial for her survival and possible return.

beats.long_title: The Journey to Aurelia Academy Begins
beats.description: The group sets off toward the academy, encountering various magical creatures and obstacles along the way. These deepen Sarah's understanding of how different this world is from Earth.

beats.long_title: Witness the Grand Entrance of Aurelia Academy
beats.description: As they break through the dense forest, the majestic spires and vast grounds of Aurelia Academy come into view, filling Sarah with awe and anticipation.

beats.long_title: A Memorable First Interaction with the Academy's Gatekeeper
beats.description: The group is greeted by a quirky and enigmatic gatekeeper, who quizzes Sarah on her intentions and tests her basic magical abilities before allowing entry.

beats.long_title: Introduction to the Academy’s Rules, Regulations, and Campus Layout
beats.description: Upon entry, the group is joined by other new students for an official orientation session. Campus rules, housing arrangements, and an introduction to the magical curriculum are all covered.

beats.long_title: Sarah Completes the Official Enrollment Process
beats.description: Sarah and the locals visit the main administrative building where she fills out the necessary paperwork, undergoes a magical assessment, and receives her official student identification.

beats.long_title: Sarah Settles into Her New Home Away from Home
beats.description: Sarah is assigned her dormitory and meets her roommate. They bond over shared curiosities and nervousness, setting the stage for future adventures together.
